description:
Note that data was taken across 3 panels and combined into a mosaic:

Panel 1 (Horsehead): Ha, Ha HDR, Oiii, Oiii HDR, RGB, RGB HDR
Panel 2 (Middle): Ha, RGB
Panel 3 (M42 area): Ha, Ha HDR, RGB, RGB HDR (I actually shot an entire night of Oiii on the Horsehead area but pretty much nothing was there)

Calibration: 
 - BPP for Master Dark, Flats, Cosmic Correction, Subframe Selector
 - Star Alignment (to Ha), Local Normalization, Image Integration, Drizzle Integration for Ha, Oiii masters

Housekeeping and "Pre-Post-Processing":
 - Crop
 - Several passes of DBE per image / per channel
 - LinearFit R and B to G, RGB Combine, more DBE & Background Neutralization
 - RGB Mosaic Combine, HDR (10" exposures) Mosaic Combine
 - Ha Mosaic Combine, Oiii, Ha and Oiii HDR data registered to mosaic

Luminance Processing:
 - HDR Merge of Ha, Oiii
 - Decon for Ha, Oiii
 - Narrowband combination into RGB
 - TGVD, MMT for Ha, Oiii using Rista method
 - SHO combination of Oiii into Ha to create Master Luminance
 - Masked Stretch + Curves tweaks

RGB Processing: 
 - RGB HDR Merge
 - Photometric Color Calib
 - Heavy drinking
 - Narrowband color combination of Ha (R), Oiii (G, B)
 - Background Neutralization
 - TGVD, MMT (Rista Color NR)
 - ArcSinH, Masked Stretch
 - LRGB Combination

Combined Processing:
 - ACDNR (Rista non-linear NR)
 - MMT for sharpening
 - Literally about a million little Curves tweak for color
 - More Heavy drinking
 - Unsharp Mask
 - Large pixel scale stretch using Range Mask
 - A few passes of DBE to target large scale color noise in background
 - Saturation increases
title: Orion's Horse & Sword (Hα/RGB/O3)
